questions.question: The contractor …………………………. be responsible for the maintenance of the building and its premises.
questions.description: In contracts, shall is often used with third person subjects to refer to obligations and duties. Will be also possible here.

questions.question: I ……………………… give you a laptop for your birthday.
questions.description: Both will and shall can be used with first person subjects in promises.

questions.question: What time ………………………. I come and see you?

questions.question: ……………………… I get something to eat?
questions.description: We use shall to ask for instructions and decisions.

questions.question: Make me a cup of tea, ………………………….. you?

I ………………………… kill you if you do that again.
